text1: A fire and forget missile with medium range and low speed and tracking. Collapse shields with brute force and consistent barrage.
EMP delivery missiles with shield bursting capability to disable even the sturdiest of ships. Deals flux damage on Shields and EMP damage on Hull.
Engine buster missile, large spread to evade even the tightest of PD fire.
A fire and forget torpedo with good range but very low speed and tracking. Flux damage on shield impact.
